ygData.subject: Re: Jaxan's and meditation
ygData.msgSnippet: Then again, if casters believe that its helpful to them, who are we to say it doesn t?  Just one more of the many uses of the bard class . Ryndal of The
ygData.messageBody:
Then again, if casters believe that its helpful to them, who are we to say
it doesn't? Just one more of the many "uses" of the bard class<G>.


Ryndal of The Steel Wind
Lvl 18
Cazic Thule

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com' <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 8:04 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Jaxan's and meditation


>From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>
>
>Lets put this Jaxan's thread to rest once and for all...J.M. has confirmed
>that there is absolutely no affect or relation whatsoever between the Jig
>and Manna restoration. Don't mean to be curt as you probably were not
>following the thread when this was revealed - but I don't want us to start
>flogging a dead horse again.
>
>CheerS!
>
>Faras Tar'Linedhel
>
